detailsOfAchievement: Sparsh Hospice, is the first palliative care centre and in-patient Hospice in the city of Hyderabad and serves the citizens of AP and the state of Telangana. We take care of end of life cancer patients (terminally ill) as well as other terminal diseases. We have admitted over 500 patients since inception. All services including food, medicines and treatment are free of cost to patients.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: We run a hospice facility in the city of Hyderabad. It is called Sparsh Hospice. Sparsh is the flagship project of Rotary Club of Banjara Hills Charitable Trust. At Sparsh hospice, we provide free palliative care to terminal cancer patients. All services to inpatients, outpatients and home care patients are absolutely free. Services include professional medical doctors and nurses services , medicines, use of medial and surgical items, food and accommodation for inpatients and their attenders.

CONDUCTED FREE MEDICAL CAMPS TO THE HIV/AIDS BENEFICIARIES FOR MINOR AILMENTS. WE ALSO PROVIDED PROTEIN POWDER AND VITAMIN TABLETS TO THE BENEFICIARIES. WE PROVIDED TRAVEL REIMBURSEMENT TO THE BENEFICIARIES. WE PROVIDED MONTHLY NUTRITIONAL SUPPLEMENTS FOR 60 HIV/AIDS INFECTED/AFFECTED BENEFICIARIES. WE GAVE COUNSELING TO THE BENEFICIARIES. WE ALSO CONDUCTED AWARENESS PROGRAMS IN THE VILLAGES. WE PROVIDED GRANTS FOR START SMALL BUSINESSES TO STAND ON THEIR OWN WHEN BENEFICIARIES LOOKS HEALTHY.

SERVING THE POOR AND NEEDY CHILDREN IN SLUM AREAS BY PROVIDING NUTRITIVE SUPPER, SEASONAL FRUITS, CLOTHES, HYGIENIC SUPPLIES, MEDICAL SUPPORT, EDUCATIONAL SUPPLEMENTS, SCHOOL UNIFORM, SCHOOL BAGS, SCHOOL FEE. GAVE AWARENESS ON SOCIAL ISSUES AND HEALTH FOR THE CHILDREN AND TO THE PARENTS. BECAUSE OF ALL THESE EFFORTS CHILDREN ARE CONTINUING THEIR EDUCATION

Children are coming to the project from slum areas and their parents wont awareness on education and wont provide nutritive food. They wont have moral values. So, we are providing to the children coaching in evening time and nutritive supper. Conducting awareness programs to the parents and children in different aspects to change their attitudes and concentration on education. So children could enjoy in their studies and some parents change their life style, concentrating on children education.

We also gave awareness to the parents on how to rear the children, enjoyment of childhood, harmonious family relations, etc. Because of these efforts children could enjoy and interested study hard.

Multipurpose activities like promoting education among weaker sections like schedule caste, schedule tribe and economically weaker sections of people from all background. 4. To establish/ start self â€“ managed studentâ€™s messes at colleges/High schools etc., and hostel facilities at all areas in the state. 5. To start examination support coaching centers, and create self â€“ employment awareness camps and opportunities and also promote awareness of opportunities for weaker sections on various central state schemes for betterment. 6. To work among the needy and weaker sections of people among the society and also promote voluntary leadership among the educated youth. 7. To start and run educational institutions in general , professional vocational and other subjects for the benefit of all youngsters to impart education at all stages for the promotion of literature, arts and sciences, sanitation, medical nursing and all other subjects that may be decided from time to time. 8.
